    • Highlights

    • Explore Shillong, known as the "Scotland of the East," with its beautiful lakes and waterfalls.
    • Discover the mesmerizing landscapes and living root bridges of Cherrapunji.
    • Visit the scenic viewpoints, caves, and waterfalls unique to Meghalaya.
    • Experience the vibrant local culture, cuisine, and handicrafts of Meghalaya.

    Meghalaya - Cherrapunji Tour - 5 Nights / 6 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Shillong

    • Arrive in Shillong, Meghalaya's capital, and transfer to your hotel.
    • Visit Umiam Lake en route for a picturesque view and boating option.
    • Relax and explore local markets in Shillong in the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 2: Shillong Sightseeing

    • Visit popular attractions like Ward’s Lake, Lady Hydari Park, and Don Bosco Museum.
    • Explore the scenic viewpoints from Shillong Peak and Elephant Falls.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 3: Shillong to Cherrapunji

    • After breakfast, drive to Cherrapunji, known for its rainfall and natural beauty.
    • Visit Nohkalikai Falls, Seven Sisters Falls, and Mawsmai Cave.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cherrapunji.

    Day 4: Cherrapunji Exploration

    • Experience a trek to the famous Double-Decker Living Root Bridge in Nongriat.
    • Visit the Eco Park and the unique Thangkharang Park with views of Bangladesh.
    • Return to the hotel for an overnight stay in Cherrapunji.

    Day 5: Cherrapunji to Mawlynnong and Dawki

    • Travel to Mawlynnong, Asia's cleanest village, and explore the Sky Walk for panoramic views.
    • Head to Dawki and enjoy a boat ride on the crystal-clear waters of the Umngot River.
    • Return to Shillong for an overnight stay.

    Day 6: Departure from Shillong

    • After breakfast, check out from the hotel and transfer to the airport or railway station.
    • End of the Meghalaya - Cherrapunji Tour.
